long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers a powerful set of tools designed to enhance your browsing and productivity experience. It includes the following features:

Picture-in-Picture (PIP) Mode:

With the PIP feature, you can easily view any video playing in the current tab in a floating window, allowing you to continue browsing without interrupting the video. You can resize and move the PIP window anywhere on your screen for maximum convenience.
Capture and Annotate Screenshots:

The extension enables you to capture the screen of the current tab with a simple click. You can also add custom comments to each screenshot, making it easy to annotate and document your observations. These comments are editable, giving you full control over the captured content.
Tab Overview and Navigation:

With the tab overview feature, you can see all your open tabs in one place. The extension allows you to quickly navigate to any tab by simply clicking on it, streamlining your workflow and improving multitasking efficiency.
This extension is a must-have for anyone looking to boost productivity, manage tabs effectively, and capture important information from their browsing sessions with ease.
